meanings.definition: A heavy, loosely woven fabric with a rough texture.
meanings.sent1: The ratine fabric felt rough to the touch.
meanings.sent2: She wore a ratine dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The ratine fabric was so rough, it tickled my skin!
meanings.sent4: The ratine fabric was like a bumpy road for my fingers.
meanings.sent5: The ratine fabric resembled a prickly blanket.

meanings.definition: To weave or make into ratine fabric.
meanings.sent1: She learned how to ratine the yarn into a beautiful fabric.
meanings.sent2: They decided to ratine the thread to create a unique texture.
meanings.sent3: He tried to ratine the fabric, but it ended up looking like a messy web!
meanings.sent4: Ratining the material was like creating a bumpy path for the fingers.
meanings.sent5: The process of ratining the fabric was intricate and fascinating.
